title: Located on W. 7th Street, Walk To Dining , W/D Incl, $500 OFF!!
posting_body: Located in the heart of Fort Worth's trendy West 7th Street, there's always something to do or see.
Participate in community events, grab a cocktail at Bar Louie or take a spa day at Envy Salon.
Immerse yourself in the affable locale.
Oversized garden tubs, Wood Floors, Natural Granite Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Washer/Dryer in Every Unit, Stainless Steel Appliances, Spacious Walk In Closets, Tiled Backsplash,

Direct Access Elevators, Monthly Social Activities, Strength-Cardio Zone, Sparkling Pool with Cabana/Grill, Fire Pit, Limited Access Building, Dog Park, Onsite Fitness Trainer, Resident Business Lounge, Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining
